metadata.title: WordPress Hours Bank | Hourly Web Developer Tenerife
metadata.description: Urgent website problems? ⏱️ Hourly WordPress Support, no commitment or monthly fees. We fix errors, viruses, and design changes.

hero.h1_lead: For urgent problems or specific changes. No monthly contracts, no strings attached. You buy a pack of hours, use it when you need it, and it never expires (within 12 months).

heroVisual.title: Total Flexibility
heroVisual.subtitle: Pay only for what you use.

painPoints.title: Fast and Precise Interventions
painPoints.content: You don't need to pay a monthly retainer if you only have a one-off problem. We tackle the error directly so your business keeps running.

useCases.description: Fix 500 error or white screen in WordPress.
Remove virus or malware and recover security.
Visual changes, buttons not working, or mobile adjustments.
Update delicate plugins without breaking the site.

featureCards.title: No Strings Attached
featureCards.description: Forget fixed contracts. You are free to use your hours today or in 6 months.

featureCards.title: Total Control
featureCards.description: We track every minute. You receive a detailed report of the time consumed on each task.

featureCards.title: Technical Priority
featureCards.description: Direct access to a Senior Developer (WPO Expert) without going through intermediaries.

ctaFinal.title: Do you have a fire to put out?
ctaFinal.content: Don't let a technical error make you lose sales. We act fast.
